10  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies;
11  
12  import java.util.SortedSet;
13  
14  import javax.swing.SwingUtilities;
15  import javax.swing.text.Document;
16  import javax.swing.text.JTextComponent;
17  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
18  
19  import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
20  
21  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.Utils;
22  
23  /**
24   * Abstract base implementation of {@link AbstractFormatterRunnable} for Java formatters.
25   *
26   * @author bahlef
27   */
28  public abstract class AbstractJavaFormatterStrategy implements IFormatterStrategyService {
29  	/**
30  	 * {@inheritDoc}
31  	 */
32  	@Override
33  	public void format(FormatterAdvice fa) {
34  		int _dot = !fa.isForSave() ? fa.getSelectionStart() : -1;
35  		int _mark = !fa.isForSave() ? fa.getSelectionEnd() : -1;
36  
37  		format(fa.getStyledDocument(), _dot, _mark, fa.getChangedElements());
38  
39  		JTextComponent editor = fa.getEditor();
40  		if (editor != null) {
41  			SwingUtilities.invokeLater(() -> {
42  				//Set caret after the formatting, if possible
43  				if (fa.getCaret() > 0) {
44  					final int car = Math.max(0, Math.min(fa.getCaret(), editor.getDocument().getLength()));
45  					editor.setCaretPosition(car);
46  					editor.requestFocus();
47  					editor.requestFocusInWindow();
48  				}
49  			});
50  		}
51  	}
52  
53  	/**
54  	 * Formats the content of the given {@link StyledDocument} in respect to the given parameters.
55  	 *
56  	 * @param document        the {@link StyledDocument}
57  	 * @param dot             start offset for formatting, will be ignored if {@code changedElements} are provided
58  	 * @param mark            end offset for formatting, will be ignored if {@code changedElements} are provided
59  	 * @param changedElements a {@link SortedSet} containing ranges as {@link Pair} objects that should be formatted
60  	 */
61  	protected abstract void format(StyledDocument document, int dot, int mark, SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements);
62  
63  	/**
64  	 * {@inheritDoc}
65  	 */
66  	@Override
67  	public boolean canHandle(Document document) {
68  		if (!Utils.isJava(document)) {
69  			return false;
70  		}
71  
72  		return true;
73  	}
74  }
